scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel watch client/index.html --out-dir server/client-build & nodemon --exec 'NODE_ENV=development node server/index.js'
scripts.build-ui: npm run clean && parcel build client/index.html --out-dir server/client-build
scripts.start: npm run clean && parcel build client/index.html --out-dir server/client-build && node server/index.js
